definition: to commit suicide
to search/to look for/to seek
short/brief/to lack/weak point/fault
to appear/also written 現|现[xian4]

sentences.english: He saved a young man who was to suicide with a danger to lose life.
sentences.chinese: 他冒着生命危险救了一个想寻短见的青年。

sentences.english: It was long time before the policewoman could dissuade her from suicide.
sentences.chinese: 女警察花了好长时间劝她不要寻短见。

sentences.english: He took the risk of his own life to save a young man who had intend to commit suicide.
sentences.chinese: 他冒着生命危险救了一个想寻短见的青年。
